2.1.2.1.1. date_time.cast_datetime_to_utc¶

date_time.cast_datetime_to_utc(date_time)¶

Set timezone to UTC without adjusting the date-time. Warning: If the date-time is naive and not in UTC, or if it is aware and not at UTC, this will change the actual moment in time that is represented. See also normalize_datetime_to_utc().
